Detailed Description

Handler prepared statements parameters.

Note:
tiodbc::param_impl is Copyable, NON inheritable and NOT direct constructable
Remarks:
You must not create objects of this class directly but instead invoke statement::param() to get one. You must not keep the objects for more than directly calling one of its members, see statement::param() for more details on this.
